posts.post_content:
It's the worst feeling when you actually quell the goblin assault and are a turn away from winning, but you're opponent has a hand full of cards. Happened to me at an FNM. I sided boarded in my [Slagstorm](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Slagstorm)s and killed his entire army on turn 4. I'm at 15 life, he's at 20. 3 Turns later, he's at 4 and i'm still at 15 and I have a frost titan ready to wreck face.   
He plays  
[Memnite](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Memnite)  
[Kuldotha Rebirth](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Kuldotha Rebirth)  
[Goblin Grenade](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Goblin Grenade)  
[Goblin Grenade](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Goblin Grenade)  
[Goblin Grenade](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Goblin Grenade)  
  
I hate this card 5/5

Posted By: Xnofos (8/23/2012 10:17:19 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
This card makes me want to try a red-blue goblin/elemental deck.  
  
[training grounds](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=training grounds) + any cheap goblin + goblin grenade + [izzet guilmage](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=izzet guilmage) = mayhem  
  
add a [soulbright flamekin](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=soulbright flamekin) to the mix: you're looking at turn 3 death.  
  
Turn 1: training grounds  
Turn 2: flamekin  
Turn 3: use ability 3 times for 8 red; drop izzet and 1-cmc goblin; goblin grenade and copy with guildmage 3-4 times ... 20-25 damage  
  
May not be able to get all cards necessary for this very often (the first 9 cards of the deck have 16.5% chance of containing all the cards necessary for the above combo), but even with a few you can still wreak havoc; not to mention having beefy elementals/copyable sorceries as a backup.
posts.html:
This card makes me want to try a red-blue goblin/elemental deck.

training grounds + any cheap goblin + goblin grenade + izzet guilmage = mayhem

add a soulbright flamekin to the mix: you're looking at turn 3 death.

Turn 1: training grounds
Turn 2: flamekin
Turn 3: use ability 3 times for 8 red; drop izzet and 1-cmc goblin; goblin grenade and copy with guildmage 3-4 times ... 20-25 damage

May not be able to get all cards necessary for this very often (the first 9 cards of the deck have 16.5% chance of containing all the cards necessary for the above combo), but even with a few you can still wreak havoc; not to mention having beefy elementals/copyable sorceries as a backup.
